directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and cool under running water.
Mix both cans of tuna into the cooled pasta. Add the mayonnaise. Stir in onion, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and oregano.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
title: Macaroni and Tuna Fish Salad
